'''2.1.12307''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.12308''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), or '''2.1.12306''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on February 24, 2020. This version added a section to sign up for the ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]'' beta.

== Additions ==
[[File:2.1.122xx.png|thumb|What the new section ''"Minecraft Dungeons"'' looks like in this version.]]

; Section ''Minecraft Dungeons''
* Contains a sign-up button and a few videos from ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]''.
